name: VR health care (head and neck exercise): Snake Fighting
name_original: VR health care (head and neck exercise): Snake Fighting
description:
VR health care (head and neck exercise): Snake Fighting adopts a totally new exercise mode，which letting the player immersed in the game, enjoy the game, while the neck swings regularly to alleviate the fatigue.



This game is carefully and scientificly designed together with professors and doctors of Chekiang Medical College.
